item.description:
Self Healing Meditation & Inner Powers Exercises

An intro to meditation, self-healing including healing your past, transforming your present and energizing your future.

Not just a meditation...Also a healing tool to live healthier and grow faster!

Harmonize your life and get revitalized
Heal the traumas and pains of your past
Sharpen your mind
Overcome your stress, fear, anger, guilt and grief
Empower and heal your relationships
Free yourself from emotional and mental blockages
Align yourself to live your greatest life

This meditation was created by Master Del Pe, world meditation expert, master of achievable enlightenment methodologies and teacher of the Eastern wisdom philosophies.

On January 13th, join Melissa Gurry, certified Family Coach-Healer & Trainer who will be leading this meditation night. She has been a student of Master Del Pe extensively for the past 10 years.
item.name: Self Healing Meditation
